meanings.definition: A tray or table used for serving tea.
meanings.sent1: The teaboard was elegantly set with cups and saucers for the afternoon tea party.
meanings.sent2: She placed the teaboard in the center of the room for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat jumped onto the teaboard, causing a commotion during tea time.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as welcoming as a beautifully arranged teaboard.
meanings.sent5: The teaboard gleamed in the sunlight, inviting guests to partake in a warm cup of tea.

meanings.definition: A board or surface on which tea is prepared or displayed.
meanings.sent1: The wooden teaboard was perfect for arranging the tea set before the guests arrived.
meanings.sent2: The teaboard showcased an array of exotic teas from around the world.
meanings.sent3: He pretended the teaboard was a stage, performing a tea-themed play for his friends.
meanings.sent4: The teaboard served as a canvas for her artistic tea presentation.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly brewed tea lingered around the teaboard, enticing everyone nearby.
